edu.ohio.ent.cs5500

Class RandomLayouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.AbstractLayouter
      • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.RandomLayouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, GraphListener, Layouter

    public class RandomLayouter
extends AbstractLayouter
implements Drawable
    CS 4500/5500 Advanced OO Design and GUI Techniques.
    This class is written as part of the course cs4500/5500 under guidance and instruction of Dr. Dusan Sormaz.
    Layouter class which creates random layout for the graph points.
    Author:
    Arif
